headline.main: Whistle-Blower Case Deserved a Fuller Examination

snippet: A federal district court and an appeals court threw out Carmen Segarra’s lawsuit, and neither court offered very persuasive reasons for doing so.
lead_paragraph: A federal district court and an appeals court threw out Carmen Segarra’s lawsuit, and neither court offered very persuasive reasons for doing so.
